title: Multimedia Resource Utilization Strategies in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Digital Literacy and Basic Language Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Language education program for professionals (medical/legal/technical). Operated in smartphone-centered limited technology environments, with learning effectiveness measured through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can complete a language learning content production project by analyzing and integrating various multimedia materials (text, images, videos)
Learners can select multimedia resources tailored to their cognitive type (VARK) and develop utilization strategies
Learners acquire practical skills to effectively utilize multimedia learning materials even in limited technological environments (smartphones)

resources: Multimedia Production Tools (Mobile-Compatible Tools like Canva)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
